results.title: The Effect of pH on Atenolol/Nanofiltration Membranes Affinity
results.text_hl: In the present work, we carried out a case study evaluating the performance of two nanofiltration membranes in the removal of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ATN@@@):a pharmaceutical compound widely used for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@:under different conditions such as operating pressure, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ATN@@@ concentration, and solution pH.
